name: nutmeg
content:
nutmeg noun
(SPICE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] the hard fruit of a tropical tree, or a brown powder made from this, used as a spice to add flavour to food: Grate some nutmeg on top of the pudding.
